column3: I don't think we need a subtle assumption about the initial subsidy here... The cost to be flexible is minuscule.
Tend to agree with @luke-jr. Do you have benchmarks, that show this is a significant improvement?
There seems to be disagreement about the changes. Closing for now.
@fanquake Thank you very much for the reference.\n@luke-jr @MarcoFalke @sipa Thank you all very much for the review.\nThanks!
